enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether the OSV data source should be enabled.

aliasSyncEnabled.title: Alias Synchronization Enabled
aliasSyncEnabled.description: Whether to include alias information in vulnerability data.

dataUrl.title: Data URL
dataUrl.description:
The URL to download OSV data from.  
**Must** be compatible with [OSV's data dumps](https://google.github.io/osv.dev/data/#data-dumps).

ecosystems.title: Ecosystems
ecosystems.description:
The ecosystems to mirror vulnerability data for.  
A list of available ecosystems can be found in the [OSV documentation](https://ossf.github.io/osv-schema/#defined-ecosystems).
